sentences.sContent: ...a secret unit within the company that had been set up to discredit its major rival.
sentences.sCn: …为破坏其主要竞争对手声誉而设的一个公司内秘密单位。

synos.tran: 怀疑；无信用；名声的败坏

remMethod.val: dis(不) + cred(相信) + it → 不信 → 使怀疑

words.tran: 丢脸的；不名誉的；有损信用的；败坏名声的

trans.tranOther: To discredit someone or something means to cause them to lose people's respect or trust
the loss of other people’s respect or trust
